00011 + (Database *)db {
00012         if (db == nil) {
00013                 db = [[Database alloc] init];
00014         }
00015         
00016         return db;

00019 - (Section *)sectionFromIdentifier:(NSNumber *)ident {
00020         for (Section *s in [self sections]) {
00021                 if (s.identifier == ident)
00022                         return s;
00023         }
00024         
00025         return [[Section alloc] initWithIdentifier:ident];
00026 }
00027 
00028 - (Entry *)entryFromIdentifier:(NSNumber *)ident {
00029         for (Section *s in [self sections]) {
00030                 for (Entry *e in s.entries) {
00031                         if (e.identifier == ident)
00032                                 return e;
00033                 }
00034         }
00035         
00036         return [[Entry alloc] initWithIdentifier:ident];
00037 }
00038 
00039 - (NSArray *)sections {
00040         if (sections == nil) {
00041                 [db load];
00042         }
00043         
00044         return sections;
00045 }
00046 
00047 - (void)load {
00048         if (!isGhost) return;
00049         
00050         // Load ghosts for all of the sections.
00051         NSString *query = @"SELECT id FROM Sections";
00052         
00053         sqlite3_stmt *statement;
00054         
00055         if (sqlite3_prepare_v2([DatabaseHelper getDatabase], [query UTF8String], -1, &statement, NULL) != SQLITE_OK) {
00056                 NSAssert(0, @"Query did not successfully complete.");
00057         }
00058         
00059         NSMutableArray *arr = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00060         
00061         while (sqlite3_step(statement) == SQLITE_ROW) {
00062                 NSNumber *num = [NSNumber numberWithInt:(int)sqlite3_column_int(statement, 0)];
00063                 Section *s = [[Section alloc] initWithIdentifier:num];
00064                 [arr addObject:s];
00065         }
00066         
00067         sections = arr;
00068         
00069         [super load];
00070 }
00071 
00072 - (NSArray *)entriesWithNameContaining:(NSString *)n {
00073         NSMutableArray *ret = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00074         
00075         for (Section *s in [self sections]) {
00076                 for (Entry *e in s.entries) {
00077                         if ([[e name] rangeOfString:n options:NSCaseInsensitiveSearch].location != NSNotFound) {
00078                                 [ret addObject:e];
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081         }
00082         
00083         return ret;
00084 }
